catalog_script_client.name: Revise User Info

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Car Parking Reservation">e2e13f79971321105515fef3a253af04</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:fae177b9971321105515fef3a253af07</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Revise User Info</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
   if (newValue != ''){
   var user = g_form.getReference('username',popInfo);
   }
   function popInfo(user)
	{
		g_form.setValue('email',user.email);
		g_form.setValue('phone',user.phone);
	}
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-06-09 10:55:25</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>691bb806975721105515fef3a253af73</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Revise User Info</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="CarParkingReservation" source="x_1067756_carparki">d6eaa7b1971321105515fef3a253afb5</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="CarParkingReservation">d6eaa7b1971321105515fef3a253afb5</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_691bb806975721105515fef3a253af73</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-06-09 10:58:48</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
